thread.title: Facebook troll poses as megachurch pastor Joel Osteen
thread.title_full: Facebook troll poses as megachurch pastor Joel Osteen

title: Facebook troll poses as megachurch pastor Joel Osteen
text:
Facebook troll poses as megachurch pastor Joel Osteen 
Daily Dot Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Megachurch pastor Joel Osteen achieved a net worth of $40 million by convincing impressionable Christians to send him money--or risk missing out on God's bountiful blessings. An advocate of prosperity gospel, Olsteen preaches that if you're having trouble, you can pay him $20 (or $30 or $40 or $5o), and he will pray that God helps/cures/protects you.?Meanwhile, comedian?...
